description_expanded: Mainstays Starlit Skies Scent 6-Cube Wax Melt (1.25oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A wax melt cube in the Starlit Skies scent. One cube is broken into pieces to use in a wax warmer. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
